title: Riot is that one friend who, when you go to their house for games...
body: They think it's ABSOLUTELY GODDAMN HILARIOUS to pick the same character every time and spam one move over and over again to be permanently immune or permanently CC you or something. You tell yourself it's just a game, but you can't shake the feeling that your friend is an asshole and you never want to go to his house again.

replies.body: Or that friend when you go to his house, he always gives you that buggy controller with the "turbo" button that fucks your commands up (yeah we all had that one controller for the little brother) and then tells you that you suck when he beats you over and over

So u want to leave lol ?
Do it
